org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.jdbc

Class JdbcDsProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.jdbc.AbstractJdbcProcessor
      • org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.jdbc.JdbcDsProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Processor, Reversible

    public class JdbcDsProcessor
extends AbstractJdbcProcessor
    This processors persists events to a JDBC database using a connection obtained from a database connection pool that is managed outside of this library. An integrating application needs to provide a reference to the connection pool through the ProcessingObjects in the AbstractJdbcProcessor.process(org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.common.Event, String, ProcessingObjects) method.

    See JdbcPoolProcessor for more information.

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        This processor does not store any confidential information.

        The implementation of this method does nothing.

      • getConnection

        protected final Connection getConnection(JdbcProperties pProperties,
                                         ProcessingObjects processingObjects)
                                  throws org.beiter.michael.db.FactoryException
        Retrieve a database connection from a connection pool spec (as provided in this class' additional properties)

        See AbstractJdbcProcessor.getConnection(JdbcProperties, ProcessingObjects).

        Retrieve a database connection, for instance (and depending on the implementation of this method), from:

        • a connection pool spec (as provided in this class' additional properties)
        • a JNDI name (as provided in this class' properties)
        • a data source (as provided in this class' processing objects)
        Specified by:
        getConnection in class AbstractJdbcProcessor
        Parameters:
        pProperties - The processor configuration
        processingObjects - The processing objects providing to the class, which may contain a DataSource object
        Returns:
        A database connection
        Throws:
        org.beiter.michael.db.FactoryException - When no database connection can be retrieved
